title: 07/05/2021 - HOUR 2 - Bucks & Suns, Colin Right, Colin Wrong, Cowboys
itunes:title: 07/05/2021 - HOUR 2 - Bucks & Suns, Colin Right, Colin Wrong, Cowboys
description:
In this hour of The Herd with Colin Cowherd, it's another edition of "Where Colin Was Right, Where Colin Was Wrong." Also, Sports Illustrated senior NBA writer Howard Beck joins The Herd to chat about Bucks-Suns in the NBA Finals. Finally, Matt Mosley--radio personality and host of The Doomsday Podcast--connects with Colin to talk about the impact of the Dallas Cowboys appearing on HBO's Hard Knocks yet again. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
